document_data.name: Jonah
document_data.mainbody:
'''Jonah''' was one of the members of the wealthy high society of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Madam, please, you mustn't leave me in suspense. Tell me you'll be mine, or tell me all is lost. One or the other, or I'll not sleep another tenday.''|Jonah's letter to Lady Jannath}}
document_data.History: At some point before the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Jonah set his eyes and amorous ambitions on Lady [[Firelia Jannath]], one of the city's [[patriar]]s and a notable patroness of the arts. He was among suitors who fought for the lady's hand in [[1492 DR]], when her lover, [[Oskar Fevras]], was presumed missing or killed, in reality, captured and enslaved by the [[Zhentarim]] smugglers.
